title: The great fall of China’s economy: GDP set for historic plunge - Aljazeera.com
description: The great fall of China’s economy: GDP set for historic plunge Aljazeera.com China's Economy Under a Lot of Pressure: Primavera Capital's Hu Bloomberg Markets and Finance China tries to revive economy but consumer engine sputters Yahoo Parenting A spectre is …
content:
The coronavirus that is now crushing demand for goods and services around the world first appeared in late December in China, and the country is getting set to announce what most analysts expect will be a historic contraction in economic activity.
